description: A humorous twist on becoming an archaeologist.
title: Ruins of Ambition
n_1: Max shares his dream of archaeology with Alex in the desert.
c1_1: Just imagine the treasures we'll find!
c2_1: Or just a bunch of old rocks...
c1_2: I can feel it, we're close!
c2_2: I feel a sunburn coming on.
n_4: Surrounded by ruins, Max is ecstatic.
c1_4: This is what I live for!
